question: Which Indian naval command is hosting the multinational mega event 'Milan 2018' at Port Blair?
explanation: The Andaman Nicobar naval command is organizing multinational mega event \"Milan 2018\" with theme \'Friendship Across the Seasâ€™ at Port Blair in Andaman & Nicobar islands from March 6 to March 13, 2018. The purpose of Milan 2018 is to enhance regional cooperation for combating Unlawful Activities at sea will be organised. The highlights of Milan 2018 are an international maritime seminar cultural and social exchanges, band concert, ship visit, sports and city parade. For the first time, Oman is also participating in this biennial exercise. This prestigious international event will also see participation of 38 delegates from the 16 participating countries, making it the largest gathering since its inception in 1995.
